Package com.github.actionfx.core.selection

Class ObservableListSelectionModel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.SelectionModel<T>
      • javafx.scene.control.MultipleSelectionModel<T>
        • com.github.actionfx.core.selection.ObservableListSelectionModel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type
    public class ObservableListSelectionModel<T>
extends javafx.scene.control.MultipleSelectionModel<T>
    Wrapper for an ObservableList to access the items of this list as a SelectionModel.

    This class is used to access user selections in controls via the ControlWrapper, in case the selection is made available as plain ObservableList inside the control (instead of a SelectionModel).

    Author:
    koster
